title: Miscellaneous Mark Twain Quotes
excerpt: Some miscellaneous Mark Twain quotes that I found amusing: “Whenever I feel the urge to exercise I lie down until it goes away” “Familiarity breeds contempt â€” and children” “The past does not repeat itself, but it rhymes” “The reports of my death are greatly exaggerated.” “None but the dead are permitted to tell the … more →
